Description: Foot sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery bowl; tall ring foot with grooved resting surface; wholly glazed black save resting surface; stamped decoration on interior: two sets of linked palmettes with band of ovules between; traces of added red on groove in resting surface; inscription cut on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 552)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1791)
